articles.author: John Glennon
articles.title: McDavid extends point streak to 10 games, Oilers top Predators
articles.description: Connor McDavid had four points to extend his point streak to 10 games, and the Edmonton Oilers defeated the Nashville Predators 6-3 at Bridgestone Arena on Tuesday.

articles.author: Corey Long
articles.title: Stamkos extends point streak to 14, Lightning defeat Kraken
articles.description: Steven Stamkos extended his point streak to 14 games for the Tampa Bay Lightning in a 6-2 win against the Seattle Kraken at Amalie Arena on Tuesday.

articles.author: Dave McCarthy
articles.title: Marner runs point streak to 23 games, Maple Leafs blank Ducks
articles.description: Mitchell Marner extended his point streak to 23 games for the Toronto Maple Leafs in a 7-0 win against the Anaheim Ducks at Scotiabank Arena on Tuesday.
